titles.title: Survival Aid For Emergencies through Medicare Act
Survival Aid For Emergencies through Medicare Act
To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to provide coverage of medically necessary home resiliency services under Medicare.

bill.summary:
Survival Aid For Emergencies through Medicare Act or the SAFE through Medicare Act
This bill provides for Medicare coverage of medically necessary services for beneficiaries who are determined to be medically at-risk during a climate or manmade disaster (i.e., home resiliency services), such as heat pumps, batteries for medical equipment, and energy efficient storage for medical supplies.
